avdta.network.node

Interface Signalized

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhasedTBR, SignalWeightedTBR, TrafficSignal

    public interface Signalized
    This interface specifies the methods and data needed for any intersection control that uses or mimics a traffic signal.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPhase(Phase p)
      Adds a Phase to this signal.
      double getOffset()
      Returns the offset for this signal cycle
      java.util.List<Phase> getPhases()
      Returns the List of Phases used in this signal
      void setOffset(double o)
      Updates the offset for this signal cycle

    • Method Detail

      • addPhase

        void addPhase(Phase p)
        Adds a Phase to this signal. Phases do not need to be added in sequence order.
        Parameters:
        p - the phase to be added

      • setOffset

        void setOffset(double o)
        Updates the offset for this signal cycle
        Parameters:
        o - the new offset

      • getOffset

        double getOffset()
        Returns the offset for this signal cycle
        Returns:
        the offset for this signal cycle

      • getPhases

        java.util.List<Phase> getPhases()
        Returns the List of Phases used in this signal
        Returns:
        the List of Phases used in this signal
